content.question: A student performs an experiment with a converging lens and obtains the graph of the magnification <math alttext="M" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> of an object as a function of the object’s distance <math alttext="s sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>o</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> from the lens.
